TRIGGER: Updater cannot connect to download server.
USEAGE: Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR000: Unable to establish connection. (EC-XXX-000)");  --or--   Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR000: Unable to establish connection. (EC-XXX-"+Sys.GetLine()+")");
Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR001: "+WWW.error+" (EC-XXX-000)");  --or--  Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR001: "+WWW.error+" (EC-XXX-"+Sys.GetLine()+")");

TRIGGER: The path defined does not exist.
USEAGE: Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR002: Path or file not specified. (EC-XXX-000)");  --or--  Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR002: Path or file not specified. (EC-XXX-"+Sys.GetLine()+")");

ERROR MESSAGE: Sys.Log(string, bool) has Invalid Arguments: (string) message cannot be null.
TRIGGER: The string attribute of Sys.Log() is null.
USEAGE: Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR003: Sys.Log(string, bool) has Invalid Arguments: (string) message cannot be null. (EC-XXX-000)");  --or--  Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR003: Sys.Log(string, bool) has Invalid Arguments: (string) message cannot be null. (EC-XXX-"+Sys.GetLine()+")");

TRIGGER: A path variable is null or string is empty.
USEAGE: Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR004: Path is null or empty. (EC-XXX-000)");  --or--  Debug.LogError("[Sys API] ERROR004: Path is null or empty. (EC-XXX-"+Sys.GetLine()+")");
